# scrollViewDidChangeAdjustedContentInset(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the scroll view’s inset values change.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func scrollViewDidChangeAdjustedContentInset(_ scrollView: UIScrollView)
```

## Parameters

- **scrollView**: The scroll-view object whose insets changed.
title: scrollViewDidChangeAdjustedContentInset(_:)
